data.title: Angela Merkel called Barack Obama today to complain against NSA attempts to eavesdrop on her personal phone. Internal investigations done by german intelligence agencies clearly hinted at US attempts to break into her phone. [Source in German]
Russia suspended all adoptions to Canada because Canada has legalized gay marriage.
India: Minor girl gang raped and burnt alive
New study shows piracy not actually killing media industry, despite lobbyist claims.
Pope removes Germany's 'luxury bishop' from diocese
DNA test proves 7 year old girl taken from by police from house in Dublin this week is related to Roma family - The couple have maintained all along that the 7-year-old blonde girl is their daughter
Pirate Bay founder writes open letter seeking to stop his extradition from Sweden

A Yemeni father has burned his 15-year-old daughter to death for keeping in touch with her fiance, police said, sparking further outrage in Yemen, where an eight-year girl died from internal bleeding on her wedding night a month ago.
There's A Glaring Lack Of Evidence Behind Claims That NSA Spying Stopped 54 Attacks
European Parliament calls for suspension of EU-US bank data deal (SWIFT) in response to NSA snooping
